ygData.subject: Re: Druid flying solo, mostly.
ygData.msgSnippet: Lavastorm is good for teen solo? I ll check it out. Barto ... if you ... once ... relatively new ... then ... quests. ... what ...
ygData.messageBody:
Lavastorm is good for teen solo?

I'll check it out.

Barto
--- In EverQuest@y..., "ZeonChar" <ZeonChar@M...> wrote:
> Go to Lavastorm, great exo and loot all the way through the teens.
>
> ~Daikun
> Shadow Knight and Guardian of Innoruuk
> Karana Server
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "IT3 Adam J. Daingerfield" <persona@a...>
> To: <EverQuest@y...>
> Sent: Tuesday, May 15, 2001 10:11 PM
> Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Druid flying solo, mostly.
>
>
> > that was my idea too...
> >
> > snare, dot, panic animal, burn, burn, burn,
> > resnare, panic animal, whack it, whack it, whack it...
> >
> > play PS2 while mana regens
> >
> > repeat...
> >
> > boring after a bit..
> >
> > at 14 go to nro or oasis and join a group there
> >
> > from 12 - 15 though...i can suggest the throne room of Crushbone
if you
> can
> > get a good group together
> >
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: MLockridge01@c... [SMTP:MLockridge01@c...]
> > > Sent: Wednesday, May 02, 2001 10:28 PM
> > > To: EverQuest@y...
> > > Subject: [EverQuest] Druid flying solo, mostly.
> > >
> > > I am developing a halfling druid for mostly solo play. I group
once
> > > in a while, but prefer to develop solo skills. I am a
relatively new
> > > player, so I am not sure just where I am going.
> > >
> > > My current goal is attaining level 14, to gain SOW and bind. I
then
> > > plan to begin traveling and picking up some of the little
quests.
> > >
> > > I am drawn initially toward the Commons. Any suggestions as to
what
> > > interesting low-level solo quests might be in that area?
> > >
> > > Barto of Rivervale.
